agents.name: accessibility-auditor
agents.description: Accessibility checking, App Store submission, WCAG compliance audit. Detects VoiceOver issues, Dynamic Type violations, color contrast failures. Prevents App Store rejections.

agents.name: build-fixer
agents.description: Xcode build failures, build errors, environment issues. Diagnoses zombie processes, Derived Data, SPM cache, simulator state. Saves 30+ minutes environment-first diagnostics.

agents.name: build-optimizer
agents.description: Slow builds, build performance optimization. Identifies slow type checking, expensive scripts, suboptimal settings, parallelization gaps. Reduces build times 30-50%.

agents.name: codable-auditor
agents.description: Codable review, JSON serialization audit, legacy code modernization. Detects manual JSON building, try? swallowing errors, JSONSerialization usage. Prevents silent data loss.

agents.name: concurrency-validator
agents.description: Swift 6 concurrency checking, data race prevention. Detects unsafe Task captures, missing @MainActor, Sendable violations, actor isolation problems. Prevents data races.

agents.name: core-data-auditor
agents.description: Core Data review, schema migration safety, production crash prevention. Detects migration risks, thread-confinement errors, N+1 queries, data loss risks. Critical safety violations.

agents.name: icloud-auditor
agents.description: iCloud sync issues, CloudKit errors, ubiquitous container problems. Detects missing entitlements, unsafe file coordination, error handling gaps, CloudKit anti-patterns. Prevents sync failures.

agents.name: iap-auditor
agents.description: In-app purchase review, StoreKit issues, transaction problems. Detects missing transaction.finish(), weak validation, missing restore, subscription tracking gaps. Prevents revenue loss and rejections.

agents.name: iap-implementation
agents.description: Add in-app purchases, StoreKit 2, subscriptions. Implements testing-first IAP with StoreKit config, StoreManager, transactions, subscription management, restore. Production-ready.

agents.name: liquid-glass-auditor
agents.description: Liquid Glass review, iOS 26 UI updates, toolbar improvements. Identifies glass effect opportunities, toolbar upgrades, search patterns, blur effect migrations, tinting opportunities for iOS 26+.

agents.name: memory-audit-runner
agents.description: Memory leak prevention, proactive leak checking. Detects 6 common patterns: timer leaks, observer leaks, closure captures, delegate cycles, view callbacks, PhotoKit accumulation. Prevents crashes.

agents.name: networking-auditor
agents.description: Networking review, deprecated APIs, App Store prep. Detects SCNetworkReachability, CFSocket, NSStream, reachability checks, hardcoded IPs, missing error handling. Prevents rejections.

agents.name: simulator-tester
agents.description: Simulator testing, test scenarios, visual verification. Sets up scenarios, captures screenshots, checks logs for crashes/errors, iterates on fixes. Closed-loop debugging with visual verification.

agents.name: storage-auditor
agents.description: File storage issues, data loss, backup bloat audit. Detects files in wrong locations, missing backup exclusions, missing file protection, storage anti-patterns. Prevents data loss.

agents.name: swiftui-nav-auditor
agents.description: SwiftUI navigation issues, deep linking, state restoration, architecture review. Detects missing NavigationPath, deep link gaps, wrong container usage, navigation correctness issues (not performance).

agents.name: swiftui-performance-analyzer
agents.description: SwiftUI performance, janky scrolling, slow animations. Detects expensive view body operations, unnecessary updates, missing lazy loading, SwiftUI-specific frame drops and scrolling issues.

agents.name: swiftui-architecture-auditor
agents.description: SwiftUI architecture, separation of concerns, testability. Detects logic in view bodies, async boundary violations, property wrapper misuse, testability gaps. Complements performance/nav audits.

agents.name: textkit-auditor
agents.description: TextKit review, Writing Tools integration, UITextView/NSTextView code review. Detects TextKit 1 fallback triggers, deprecated glyph APIs, missing TextKit 2 features. Prevents Writing Tools loss.
